title: Un-Shattering Lucy
description: The conclusion to USA Today Terri Anne Browning’s The Lucy & Harris Novella Series.Shattered.That was how Lucy Thornton felt in the aftermath of her breakup with Harris Cutter. Her family thought the best thing for her to do was to put the length of the country between her and Harris.Reluctantly, she went.The second Harris sets eyes on Lucy again, he knows she hasn’t moved on any more than he has. Realizing that he screwed up, he sets out to prove that they belong together. But the road to un-shattering Lucy is longer and darker than he ever could have imagined.
author: Terri Anne Browning
